subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Penguins held off a relentless Detroit attack, which poured 58 shots on Pittsburgh goalie Marc-André Fleury, and finally snatched the game away for good.
snippet: The Penguins held off a relentless Detroit attack, which poured 58 shots on Pittsburgh goalie Marc-André Fleury, and finally snatched the game away for good.
